about_the_game:
Detective Fantasia: EXCALIMURDER is a Game Boy-inspired open world murder mystery game in which you investigate with complete freedom by walking around, inspecting the world and pointing out inconsistencies!

Also, Excalibur is the murder weapon.

The bell rings on a new year as the body of an orphan was found slashed near Excalibur. Did someone really pull out the legendary sword to commit this atrocity?

Follow Fantasia, a young man who was sent to report on the crime scene, and collect clues to solve this strange murder...

  • Explore freely the entirety of the Excalibur Orphanage from the beginning!

  • Roam around a colorful top-down pixel art world inspired by the Game Boy aesthetic!

  • Talk to whoever you want, inspect every nook and cranny! Crucial clues get added to your notebook!

  • Open your notebook to reread any clue you've obtained and...

  • ...if you spot an inconsistency, select the contradicting clues to get closer to the truth!

  • Once you've discovered every inconsistencies in the case, be ready to face the mind-blowing truth behind this mystery...

content_descriptors.notes: All adult scenes depict dead children lying in their own blood, though the style is very cartoony and not very detailed since it's all low-res pixel art.
